rounds.event: Colgan Air Flight 3407 crashes into a house in Clarence Center, New York while on approach to Buffalo Niagara International Airport, killing all on board and one on the ground.
USS Macon (ZRS-5), one of the two largest helium-filled airships ever created, crashes into the Pacific Ocean off the coast of California and sinks.
births: Gene McDaniels, American singer-songwriter and producer
deaths: Auguste Escoffier, French chef and author

rounds.event: A devastating tornado outbreak in Mississippi and Alabama kills 45 people and injures 427 others.
births: Maud Adams, Swedish model and actress
David D. Friedman, American economist, physicist, and scholar

rounds.event: New Zealand's worst maritime disaster of the 20th century happens when the SS Penguin, an inter-island ferry, sinks and explodes at the entrance to Wellington Harbour.
births: Zoran Mušič, Slovene painter and illustrator

rounds.event: Four thieves break into the National Gallery of Norway and steal Edvard Munch's iconic painting The Scream.
deaths: Donald Judd, American painter and sculptor
